body.name: Wireless Microphone, Uhf Metal Dynamic Handheld Karaoke Mic, Rechargeable Receiver (Work 6hs),160ft Range, for Karaoke, Singing, Stage, Wedding, Speech, Karaoke Machine, Speaker, Amplifier, Mixer
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 14 hrs 1 min
features: 【Wireless karaoke microphone with bluetooth】: built-in high sensitivity professional dynamic microphone, transmission distance upgrade to 98ft (30m), bluetooth 32ft(10m) ◆signal stability◆no delay◆no radiation◆anti-howling◆anti-jamming ◆constant frequency◆distortion <0.2%◆15 uhf adjustable channels. ◆only applicable to input devices with mic interface, 6.35mm (1/4") or 3.5mm(1/8''), not applicable to aux / line in jack.

【Wireless microphone system with echo/treble/bass】 : The wireless karaoke microphone has echo, treble, bass control button, so you can choose different sound effects according to different songs. This wireless microphone has bluetooth, connect via bluetooth name( bietrun) to play your favorite music.It has 15 channels, you can remove the battery cover, short press CH button to adjust channel to avoid interference. Perfect for karaoke, speech, meeting, conference, indoor or outdoor.

【portable and professional dual dynamic microphone】: plug and play, no extra setting. you can adjust echo, treble, bass, volume or switch channels on the handheld microphone, portable and convenient, eliminating the trouble of carrying the receiving system. comes with handheld wireless karaoke microphone, widely applied to conference,speech, web podcast, yoga instructor, church, get together, family party, opening ceremony, dancing instructor, promotion etc.

【1200mAH battery and display】：the receiver of this wireless microphone built-in 1200 mAH rechargeable lithium-ion batteries, offer about 8 hours working time and fully charged in 3 hours. the microphone does not come with any batteries, we recommend using 2 aa amazon alkaline batteries. And our bluetooth microphone has large led display, you can see the batteries, channels and signal clearly.

【Advanced connection and after sales】: If your microphone has no sound, make sure you have enough power for the microphone and receiver. insert the mic jack, not an aux/line in jack. Bietrun offers 1-year warranty and free replacement service.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: High Quality Wireless Microphone System 1. Use UHF technology, give you clearer sound quality, signal stability, no delay, anti-howling, anti-jamming. 2. Working range : UHF up to 98 ft, Bluetooth range is 32 feet 3. Portable Microphone: Operate all function on the handheld microphone 4. Bluetooth 4.2 available, search the Bluetooth "Bietrun" in the Bluetooth device list and connect it. 5. 15 sets working together: 15 microphones max 6. High quality sound : ECHO, reverberation regulation 10 Levels TREBLE , high pitch adjustment, 8 Levels BASS, Bass adjust, 8 Levels 7. Volume Adjustable: 5 levels total 8. High Quality Material: steel meshed microphone head 9. Large LCD Display: power, signal, frequency, channel statues display

Professional Wireless Microphone Cardioid Polar Pattern：Microphone has the most sensitivity at the front end and the least sensitive at the back end. This isolates it from unwanted ambient sound and gives much more resistance to feedback than omnidirectional microphones.Widely applied：conference,speech, Web podcast,YouTube recording, Outdoor recording, Yoga instructor, Voice amplifier, dancing instructor, Promotion, Ball game podcast.

Cardioid Microphone Dynamic Microphone: Robust and reliable, long lasting, performance stable and having low noise. UHF Wireless Microphone Easy To Pair : Put 2 AA batteries into the mic correctly, then press the power buttons on the receiver and mic, it will pair automatically. Adjust channel: Remove the battery cover of the mic, short press the grey circle button to adjust channel between CH01-CH15 to avoid interference. Bluetooth Microphone How To Connect The Bluetooth: Press the power button on the receiver to turn on it, the blue light of the BT will flash, search “Bietrun“ on the bluetooth list to connect. Microphone/Receiver Power Wireless Microphone: Use 2 AA batteries. Receiver: Rechargeable. Working Time: 8 hours, Charging Time: 3 hours.

Only compatible with speakers with MIC input JBL: PartyBox 100, 200,300,1000.Sony: MHC-V13 High Power Audio System.Pyle: Pyle PDA4BU.5/Pyle P3301BAT/PSBT65A/PWMA325BT/Pyle PWMA930IBT/PPHP1037UB/PPHP1235WMU/PPHP155ST/PPHP1599WU.ION:Party Rocker Plus/Tailgater Plus/Tailgater Smart/Block Rocker Plus.Electro-Voice: ELX200-12P/ELX200-10P/ELX200-15P/ZLX-12BT/ZLX-15BT/ETX-10P/ELX200-18S/ETX-15P/ETX-12P/ETX-15SP.PRORECK: PRORECK Club 4000/3000/3200/AB,PRORECK Party 12/Proreck Dance 12/Proreck Dance 15/PRORECK PARTY 15/PRORECK MX8/10/15,PRORECK Freedom 12/8/15,PRORECK PARTY 10/PRORECK PR-C1.Rockville:BPA10/12/225/8/RAM12BT/15BT/ROCKNGO 8/10/RPG/RSM12A/15A.Acoustic Audio by Goldwood:AA15LBS/PRTY151/AAT1003/BBQ152. Not compatible with Bluetooth speakers and AUX input. Widely applied to conference,speech, Web podcast, Yoga instructor, church, get together, Family party, Opening Ceremony, dancing instructor, Promotion etc.

How To use The wireless microphone? No need to pairing, paired by factory default, plug and play. If the speakers or amplifiers has the 6.35 mm mic, just plug the receiver into it directly. If the karaoke machine only has the 3.5 mm mic, you need to use the 6.35 to 3.5 mm adapter. Only support Mic input jack, not support Aux or Line in jack. How to Change Channels? Remove the battery cover of the mic, short press the grey circle button to adjust channel between CH01-CH15 to avoid interference. How to Connect with the Bluetooth ? Press the power button on the receiver to turn on it, the blue light of the BT will flash, search “Bietrun“ on the bluetooth list to connect. If you need to use multiple wireless microphones at the same time, press the channel button to switch channels (channel numbers Not the same), otherwise there may be noise or no sound.In order for the wireless microphone to work properly, charge the receiver for 3 hours after receiving the product before using it.If the sound is small, please press the VOL + button to increase the sound (5 levels)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE and great quality!
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this mic shortly before our wedding and it arrived early on time but unfortunately the mic I ordered had some issues making it unusable. I reached out to Bietrun and they priority shipped me out another mic in one day to a different address (2 hours away where our wedding was) and saved the day. They were super easy to deal with and the mic is great quality and super easy to set up and connect. You literally just turn the mic and the transmitter on and they immediately sink together (made things much easier for friend who was acting dj for the actual ceremony) sounds great, worked about 50 yards away from our speaker which was impressive and has a healthy weight (makes me feel like it’s a quality mic and not plastic garbage). Thanks again Bietrun you guys were the hero of my wedding and really helped take a lot of the stress of wedding planning off my shoulders! 10/10 would buy again and recommend to others!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as described
reviews.reviewText: The mic feel solid while not too heavy. The sound quality is good and I used it in a small room so I couldn't test the range but it never had a connection issue. I had some trouble understanding the paring but its not too difficult of a process since it is just one button. I wish the included adapter was more of a dongle but other than that there is nothing to complain about.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars My kid loves it!
reviews.reviewText: My 9yr old loves to sing and entertain. Hooked this up to the karaoke/PA system and he loves it! Works great for us so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Mic at affordable price!
reviews.reviewText: Wanted a portable microphone that has good range. Currently using it with my JBL PB Encore and great for the on-the-go. Just remember to charge your receiver before use. Highly recommend it and would buy it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Working well, easy to set up

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Failed on first use
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to use at outdoor events like car shows. When I first received my bietrun wireless microphone I tested it in my basement studio and it paired automatically and worked just fine. It then sat in my gig bag for a couple of months before I had a chance to use it at a car show this past weekend. When I set it up I could not get it to pair. I tried holding down the Hi/Lo button and let it flash through all the channels while turning on the receiver and still could not get it to pair. I had to use a back up mic I had (fortunately) for the show. I do not recommend and will not buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good sound qualit
reviews.reviewText: I used this for a family reunion banquet. The sound quality was very good and the battery lasted the entire evening. This was a good buy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The microphone is very heavyweight and good. The sound quality is very good. I just wish the adapter that allows it to be wireless held a charge for a longer than it does. We often have to take it out and plug it back in to USB to charge it back up so that the wireless mic Won’t die on us.
Microfono muy bueno, la pila muy bien y la calidad de la voz excelente
Suena muy bien, es fácil de usar, la bacteria le dura.

Easy to use and its plug and play. Mike connects automatically to the receiver.I do wish I could flick a button to mute it. To turn off, I need to press and hold for a few sec. Turning on too takes some time.
